infos.value: I have briefly summarized my explanations. If you could check them, it would be most appreciated.
Through victory, you can gain renown and procure various spoils of war that would otherwise be unobtainable. By all means, please join in and give it a try.

• Guild Battles •
Guild Battle Entry will become automatic once there are 10 or more members in your guild.
All Guild Battles are carried out automatically.
<color=#00ffff>Only Guild Leaders and Sub Leaders</color> can manage Guild Battle Attack Parties and Defense Parties.
In order to start a Guild Battle, it is necessary to establish <color=#00ffff>formations</color> of <color=#00ffff>Attack Members</color> and <color=#00ffff>Defense Members</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on Guild Battles?
